ygData.subject: Re: Skull and Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Wasn t there a post the other day that said this is not possible to attach a skull to a staff??  I think I saw that somewhere, several times in fact.  I think
ygData.messageBody:
Wasn't there a post the other day that said this is not possible to attach
a skull to a staff?? I think I saw that somewhere, several times in
fact. I think you have to use the skull in one hand and a one hand weapon
in the other.


At 09:37 AM 5/17/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Scott J. Geertgens" <geertges@...>
>
>
>
>On Mon, 17 May 1999, Joe Moore wrote:
>
> > From: "Joe Moore" <jmoore@...>
> >
> > Hi 18th lev Sizkrath here Cazic Thule server. How in the hell do you
> attach
> > these items together ? is it possible or just rumored?
>
> > >
> > >Skull of Jhen Tra is "Staff Skull" found on Embalmers in Lake
> > >Rathetear. You can also find the coveted Runed Totem staff on the
> > >Gnoll High Shamans there.
>
> This skull cannot be attached to a staff. There may be another that
>could be, but this one cannot.
>
>Valdus
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
>http://www.onelist.com
>More than 1,000!
